# npm-statistics

![NPM Stats](https://img.shields.io/endpoint?url=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FJamesHenry%2Fnpm-statistics%2Fmaster%2Fstats.json)

NPM Download Statistics for James Henry's Open Source Projects. Updated Daily.

Thank you to https://github.com/ClearTax/npm-statistics for providing the initial implementation of this and sharing it with the community ❤️
